definitions.definition: Someone who lives in modern times.
Pertaining to a current or recent time and style; not ancient.
definitions.example: Our online interactive game is a modern approach to teaching about gum disease.  Although it was built in the 1600s, the building still has a very modern look.

definitions.definition: (history) Pertaining to the modern period (c.1800 to contemporary times), particularly in academic historiography.
